title: Hershey's Miniature Special Dark Chocolate Bars, Bulk, Individually Wrapped Minis (3 Lbs.) Perfect for Christmas Gifts & Exchanges, Movie and Game Nights & More!
features: IRRESISTIBLE FLAVOR:The rich, sweet taste of Special Dark, mildly sweet, chocolate you know and love - in miniature form, wrapped and ready to go!

Toss them into lunches, share them at the office, add them to baked goods, or wrap them as gifts. You can't go wrong with mini chocolate bars!
PROFESSIONALLY PACKAGED: This product is professionally repackaged by RiverFinn, which is not affiliated with the original manufacturers of the product..
WE'VE GOT YOUR BACK: Customer Service is our number one priority. If you aren't thrilled, we will replace or refund, even if it means exceeding Amazon's standard return policies.
